title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
desc: A young hobbit, Frodo Baggins, is tasked with destroying an ancient and powerful ring to save Middle-earth.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
desc: In the second part of the legendary trilogy, Frodo and his friends continue their journey to destroy the One Ring while forging new alliances.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
desc: In the trilogy's finale, forces of good and evil face off in a final battle to determine the fate of Middle-earth.

title: Inception
desc: Dom Cobb is a skilled thief who steals secrets from the subconscious by entering people's dreams.

title: Breaking Bad
desc: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with cancer starts manufacturing drugs with a former student to secure his family's future.

title: The Dark Knight
desc: Batman attempts to stop the chaos wreaked upon Gotham City by a criminal mastermind known as the Joker.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
desc: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

title: Naruto
desc: An outcast young ninja struggles to become the strongest leader (Hokage) of his village and gain everyone's respect.

title: Dragon Ball
desc: Goku, a small boy with a monkey tail, goes on a great adventure to find the seven legendary Dragon Balls.

title: Dragon Ball Super
desc: After the defeat of Majin Buu, Goku meets the God of Destruction Beerus and reaches new power levels.

title: Dexter
desc: By day, mild-mannered Dexter is a forensics expert, but by night, he is a serial killer who hunts down criminals who have escaped justice.

title: The Matrix
desc: A computer hacker learns that his world is a simulation and discovers he is 'The One' who will save humanity.

title: Fight Club
desc: An ordinary office worker meets a charismatic soap salesman and they found a secret underground fight club.

title: Better Call Saul
desc: A prequel to Breaking Bad, this series follows small-time lawyer Jimmy McGill's transformation into the morally ambiguous Saul Goodman.

title: Sherlock
desc: Famous detective Sherlock Holmes and his partner Dr. Watson solve the most complex mysteries in modern-day London.

title: Stranger Things
desc: When a young boy disappears, a small town uncovers a mystery involving supernatural forces and secret government experiments.

title: Game of Thrones
desc: Noble families fight for control of the Seven Kingdoms, engaging in a bloody struggle for the Iron Throne.

title: Peaky Blinders
desc: In post-WWI Birmingham, gang leader Thomas Shelby will stop at nothing to expand his family's power.

title: Doctor Who
desc: An alien Time Lord travels through time and space, experiencing adventures in different eras and places.

title: The Good Place
desc: A woman wakes up in the afterlife and tries to become a better person in this comedy series exploring ethics.

title: Godzilla
desc: A giant monster poses a massive threat to humanity as the world faces the rise of ancient predators.

title: Godzilla Minus One
desc: Post-war Japan is at its lowest point when a new crisis emerges in the form of a giant monster, Godzilla.

title: The Avengers
desc: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
desc: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos.

title: Avengers: Endgame
desc: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. The Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
desc: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes start to appear.

title: Black Panther
desc: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future.

title: Thor: Ragnarok
desc: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnar√∂k.

title: Captain America: Civil War
desc: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

title: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End
desc: After defeating the Demon King, the elf mage Frieren sets out on a journey to learn more about humans.
